Lieutenant Colonel Jimi Koroi (~1943/1944 - February 2022) bụ onye agha na onye uwe ojii Fijian onye ọchịchị ndị agha họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye na-anọchite anya Kọmishọna nke ndị uwe ojii mgbe nnupụisi Fijian nke afọ 2006 gasịrị.

Koroi si n'obodo Nawaikama na Gau Island. Ọ sonyeere ndị uwe ojii Fiji na July 1964, wee rịgoro n'ọkwa wee bụrụ osote kọmishọna na 1988. N'afọ 1988, o nwere ihe mberede okporo ụzọ nke mere ka ọ nọrọ n'oche nkwagharị. Mgbe nnupụisi nke afọ 2006 gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-anọchite anya ndị uwe ojii na 6 Disemba 2006, na-anọchi Moses Driver, onye megidere nnupụis ahụ.  Romanu Tikotikoca nọchiri ya dị ka Kọmishọna na 9 Febụwarị 2007.
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019, e nyere ya ihe nrite Fiji Police Long Service Medal. N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, e nyere ya ihe nrite ncheta afọ iri ise nke nnwere onwe Fiji.
